title: Team Quest recruiting Diamond Support and Coach for SumSoc Tournament and OOL
body:
Hi Everyone,

Team Quest is currently seeking a Diamond Support and coach for the upcoming SumSoc tournament and OOL Split.

We are looking for a player who is looking to work hard with our team to win the SumSoc tournament and to place well in the OOL ladder.

Must be available Monday nights and Weekends for tournaments and regularly on weeknights for scrims.

We are also looking for a coach to help us with out pick/ban strategy and player development.  

If you are interested in either role please contact me in game IGN - Bardarella or by email bardarellagg@gmail.com

Cheers,

Sam
